title: Joel Edgerton enjoys a romantic lunch with Christine Centenera in Sydney
text:
He made a showstopping appearance at the premiere of his latest film, The King, on Thursday.

But two days after the event, Joel Edgerton kept a low profile in a hat and sunglasses while enjoying a romantic lunch with his girlfriend Christine Centenera in Sydney.

The 45-year-old donned a casual ensemble and unkempt beard as he walked hand in hand with Christine as they made their way to a cafe.

Scroll down for video

Fit for a king! Joel Edgerton (pictured) enjoyed a romantic lunch with his girlfriend Christine Centenera (right) in Sydney on Saturday

Stroll: Joel kept a low profile wearing a hat and sunglasses while walking hand in hand with Christine

Joel wore brown pants, a white t-shirt and navy jumper with a yellow logo to the lunch date.

He accessorised his ensemble with a pair of sand coloured boots and sunglasses to shield himself from the sun.

Christine also wore a casual ensemble, opting for a pair of activewear tights, a black jumper, sneakers and a hat.

Style: Joel donned a casual ensemble consisting of brown pants, a white t-shirt and navy jumper

Casual: Christine wore sport tights, a black jumper, sneakers and a hat to shield herself from the sun

She styled her brunette locks in waves which fell effortlessly by her shoulders while letting natural beauty shine with minimal makeup.

Their outing comes just two days after Joel attended The King premiere in Sydney with his proud parents on Thursday.

Joel and his stunning partner have been dating since last year after meeting through mutual friends.

Relaxing: Joel and Christine enjoyed each others company while soaking up the sun and eating a meal outdoors

Loved-up: Joel and Christine have been dating since last year after meeting through mutual friends

Romance: They first sparked romance rumours when they were pictured hugging in Sydney in 2018

They first sparked romance rumours when they were pictured hugging in Sydney in 2018.

Soon after, the pair were spotted having dinner together in London, UK.

In mid-February this year, Joel stepped out to support Christine at her Wardrobe.NYC concept store opening in the Big Apple.
